name: alert-dialog
description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user

files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { AlertDialogRoot } from 'reka-ui'

const props = defineProps<{
  open?: boolean
  defaultOpen?: boolean
}>()
const emit = defineEmits<{
  'update:open': [value: boolean]
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <AlertDialogRoot v-bind="props" @update:open="emit('update:open', $event)">
    <slot />
  </AlertDialogRoot>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { AlertDialogTrigger as AlertDialogTriggerPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
</script>

<template>
  <AlertDialogTriggerPrimitive as-child>
    <slot />
  </AlertDialogTriggerPrimitive>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  AlertDialogPortal,
  AlertDialogOverlay,
  AlertDialogContent as AlertDialogContentPrimitive,
} from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <AlertDialogPortal>
    <AlertDialogOverlay
      class="fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black/70 data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0 data-[state=open]:fade-in-0"
    />
    <AlertDialogContentPrimitive
      :class="
        cn(
          'fixed left-[50%] top-[50%] z-50 grid w-full max-w-lg translate-x-[-50%] translate-y-[-50%] gap-4 border-3 border-foreground bg-background p-6 shadow-[8px_8px_0px_hsl(var(--shadow-color))] duration-200 data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0 data-[state=open]:fade-in-0 data-[state=closed]:zoom-out-95 data-[state=open]:zoom-in-95 data-[state=closed]:slide-out-to-left-1/2 data-[state=closed]:slide-out-to-top-[48%] data-[state=open]:slide-in-from-left-1/2 data-[state=open]:slide-in-from-top-[48%]',
          $props.class
        )
      "
    >
      <slot />
    </AlertDialogContentPrimitive>
  </AlertDialogPortal>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { AlertDialogTitle as AlertDialogTitlePrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <AlertDialogTitlePrimitive
    :class="cn('text-lg font-bold uppercase tracking-wide', $props.class)"
  >
    <slot />
  </AlertDialogTitlePrimitive>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { AlertDialogDescription as AlertDialogDescriptionPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <AlertDialogDescriptionPrimitive :class="cn('text-sm text-muted-foreground', $props.class)">
    <slot />
  </AlertDialogDescriptionPrimitive>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { AlertDialogAction as AlertDialogActionPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
import { buttonVariants } from './button-variants'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <AlertDialogActionPrimitive :class="cn(buttonVariants(), $props.class)">
    <slot />
  </AlertDialogActionPrimitive>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { AlertDialogCancel as AlertDialogCancelPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
import { buttonVariants } from './button-variants'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <AlertDialogCancelPrimitive :class="cn(buttonVariants({ variant: 'outline' }), $props.class)">
    <slot />
  </AlertDialogCancelPrimitive>
</template>
